subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Management Team receives the inventory shipment from the warehouse.
success_criteria: Inventory shipment is received by the Inventory Management Team.

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Management Team verifies the received quantity against the original order and packing slip to ensure accuracy.
success_criteria: Received quantity matches the order and packing slip.

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Management Team updates the inventory management system to reflect the received inventory.
success_criteria: Inventory management system is updated with accurate stock levels.

subprocess_flow.description: Determine the products which need to be restocked urgently, based on sales data and stock-out duration.
success_criteria: Prioritization of products to be restocked is completed

subprocess_flow.description: Clear the designated restocking area and gather necessary equipment (e.g., carts, shelf labels).
success_criteria: Restocking area is prepared and ready for restocking.

subprocess_flow.description: The dedicated overnight restocking crew and sales associates restock the shelves, ensuring products are placed in the correct location and updating shelf labels as needed.
success_criteria: Shelves are replenished with the received inventory.
Products are placed in the correct location.
Shelf labels are updated as needed.

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Management Team monitors the sales floor to ensure that shelves are adequately stocked and that stock-outs are avoided.
success_criteria: Sales floor is regularly monitored for stock levels.
